# Module Assessments

Make sure you've gone through all the content for this module.

## Quiz

Fill out the quiz sheet for module 1 and submit it. You can find the sheet(s) for this module and submission instructions in the _Course Resources_ section.


## Exercise

For this module, you are asked to do a small project which involves producing a short personal introduction of yourself. For a detailed description and instructions, see the [Introducing Ourselves](./Exercise_Introducing_Ourselves.html) document in the _Exercises_ section.
